text: wwaed allah subhanah wteala musaa lmnajat rabih thlathyn lylt, thuma zadh fi al'ajal baed dhlk eshr lyal, ftmm ma waqqatah allah lmwsa ltklymh 'arbaein lyl. waqal musaa li'akhih harun -hyn 'arad almdy lmnajat rbh-: kuna khlyfty fi qawmi hataa arje, wahmilahm ealaa taeat allah webadth, wala tslk tariq aladhin yufsidun fi alard
